name: copytabs
description: This Visual Studio Code extension allows you to copy the content of all opened tabs into a new tab, including their file locations. Perfect for sharing code context with AI assistants, code reviews, documentation, debugging, and teaching. Easily compile and share your entire project or selected files with configurable options for a seamless workflow.

copytabs.includeFileTypes.description: File types to include in the copy process. Leave empty to include all files.

copytabs.excludeFileTypes.description: File types to exclude from the copy process.

copytabs.separatorLine.description: The separator line to use between files.

copytabs.includeComments.description: Whether to include comments in the copied content.

copytabs.includeLineNumbers.description: Include line numbers in the copied content

copytabs.includeFileTree.description: Include a structured file tree at the top of the copied content

copytabs.structuredTreePosition.description: Position to include the structured file tree (start or end of the document)

commands.title: Copy All Tabs to New Tab
Copy Selected Tabs to New Tab

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
